page.title: 20YENTON MINSTER HOMES
page.content:
{ {JAN.1985}-Parish Council considered planning application to erect 41 houses with garages, construct access road & convert barn into dwelling on land between College Street and Cross Lane.Council objected, asked for 20 varied homes.
{FEB.}-Yenton suggested 26 houses & 9 bungalows,but no pedestrian way. Council still thought over intensive,-pushed for 20 homes.
{APRIL}Yenton applied for 31 dwellings. Council A.G.M.-urged residents to complain to Rushcliffe Borough Council
{SEPT.}-request for footpath.
{OCT.}plans for 22 houses & bungalows approved.Still no plans for ped. way.
